Strata London, May 21-24 (and Strata San Jose, Mar 5-8) – KDnuggets Offer

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: London, San Jose, Strata

Strata gives you the tools, skills, and intel to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of data. Best price till Fri, Feb 23, 2018. Also, save 20% on Strata San Jose with code KDNU.


May 21–24
London, UK
Best Price ends Feb 23

Strata Data Conference is returning to London May 21–24. It's an extraordinary opportunity to hear some of the industry's biggest innovators share the latest data developments from an insider's perspective. Also see compelling data case studies, proven best practices, effective new analytic approaches, and learn some exceptional technical skills.
Packed with over 100 tutorials and sessions including executive briefings, the latest in data engineering and architecture, new developments in data science and machine learning, as well as small-group intensive training courses—Strata gives you the tools, skills, and intel to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of data.
Register today. Pass prices go up after Friday, Feb 23, 2018.
Learn more
Ben Lorica, Doug Cutting, and Alistair Croll
Strata Program Chairs
P.S. Strata San Jose starts in less than two weeks. As part of the KDnuggets community, you can save an additional 20% on Gold, Silver, and Bronze passes for London or San Jose with code KDNU.
